emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_grid

Class DocumentGridAxisRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • prefuse.render.AbstractShapeRenderer
      • emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_grid.DocumentGridAxisRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    prefuse.render.Renderer

    public class DocumentGridAxisRenderer
extends prefuse.render.AbstractShapeRenderer
    Renderer for the variable-sized axes used by the DocumentGrid view. Based heavily upon prefuse.render.AxisRenderer (with substantial modifications).
